title: Catherine Penaranda Escobar
text:
About Me



Catherine Penaranda Escobar


I’m Catherine Penaranda Escobar, a dedicated and results-oriented Results-driven professional with a background in economics, public policy, and business strategy. Experienced in project management and stakeholder engagement. Skilled in analyzing economic trends, developing strategic policies, and leading cross-functional teams. Currently pursuing an MBA to enhance leadership and financial decision-making skills.



Education

MBA Candidate, University Canada West, Vancouver, Canada. (2024 – Present)
Master of Public Policy in Economics, Universidad del Rosario, Bogota, Colombia. (2018 – 2021)
Specialist in Public Policy Analysis, Universidad Nacional de Colombia, Bogota, Colombia. (2013 – 2014)
Economist, Escuela Colombiana de Ingeniería “Julio Garavito”, Bogota, Colombia. (2007 – 2012)




Professional Experience

Project Coordinator
Colombian Association of Oil and Gas, Bogota, Colombia.
2021 – 2024

Developed and implemented social and environmental projects in oil and gas regions.
Built relationships with stakeholders, government agencies, and private sector partners.
Managed project timelines, budgets, and risk assessments.



Specialized Professional
Ministry of Agriculture and Rural Development, Bogota, Colombia. 2013 – 2021

Designed and monitored public policies for agricultural finance and production chains.
Conducted economic research and policy assessments to support sustainable development.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to implement regulatory frameworks.





Key Skills


Hard Skills


🌟 Economic and policy analysis


🌟 Business strategy


🌟 Project management


🌟 Market research and data analysis


🌟 Stakeholder engagement


🌟 Microsoft Office Suite


🌟 Canva (Graphic design and presentations)




Soft Skills


🌟 Leadership and strategic vision


🌟 Problem-solving and critical thinking


🌟 Communication and negotiation


🌟 Adaptability and teamwork


🌟 Multicultural awareness







Contact

📧 Email: catapees@gmail.com
🌐 LinkedIn: www.linkedin.com/in/catherine-peñaranda-escobar-401b7385
📍 Location: New Westminster, BC, Canada
